Lettera | Indirizzo | Valore
i | 0111'1000 | 0100'1001
B | 0111'1001 | 0100'0010
M | 0111'1010 | 0100'1101

Data | Adress | Control
****'**** 0111'1000 010
0100'1001 0111'1000 011
0100'1001 0000'0000 000
0100'1001 0000'0000 001
0100'1001 0111'1001 010
0100'0010 0111'1001 011
0100'0010 0000'0001 000
0100'0010 0000'0001 000
0100'0010 0000'0001 001
0100'0010 0111'1010 010
0100'1101 0111'1010 011
0100'1101 0000'0010 000
0100'1101 0000'0010 001


20 0 10 0 21 0 11 0
31 24 0 0 D 10 0 20
50

8 INPUT 0
10 LOADA 0
12 INPUT 0
14 LOADB 0
16 JE 24
18 STORE 0 D
21 LOADA 0
23 OUTPUT
24 END
